        public static Villa createVilla​(java.lang.String residenceID,
                                float areaInSquareMeter,
                                int numberOfLivingRooms,
                                int numberOfRooms,
                                float price)
        Parameters:
        residenceID - indicates the unique ID of the residence.
        areaInSquareMeter - indicates the area of the villa objects.
        numberOfLivingRooms - indicates the number of the living rooms of the villa objects.
        numberOfRooms - indicates the number of rooms of the villa.
        price - indicated the prices of the villa.
        Returns:
        the created House object.
